com.laughingmasq.pong.graphics

Class SpriteFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.laughingmasq.pong.graphics.SpriteFactory

  • public class SpriteFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Used when entity is created, to give it the corresponding sprite. When you create an entity which you want to draw, add its sprite class here. Exists for easier sprite creation.
    Author:
    schme
